QueryResults.Content:
Safety Information
      
      
      
      
         This library groups a set of safety warnings and precautions.
         
         
         Note: 
            
              ROAD SAFETY COMES FIRST
            
            
            
            Don't use a hand-held phone while driving.
            
            
         
         
         
         Note: 
            
             INTERFERENCE
            
            
            
            All wireless phones may get interference, which could affect performance.
            
            
         
         
         
         Note: 
            
              SWITCH OFF IN HOSPITALS
            
            
            
            Follow any regulations or rules. Switch the phone off near medical equipment.
            
            
         
         
         
         Note: 
            
             SWITCH OFF IN AIRCRAFT
            
            
            
            Wireless devices can cause interference in aircraft.
            
            
         
         
         
         Note: 
            
             SWITCH OFF WHEN REFUELLING
            
            
            
            Don't use the phone at a refuelling point. Don't use near fuel or chemicals.
            
            
         
         
         
         Note: 
            
             SWITCH OFF NEAR BLASTING
            
            
            
            Don't use the phone where blasting is in progress. Observe restrictions, and follow any regulations or rules.
            
            
         
         
         
         Note: 
            
             QUALIFIED SERVICE
            
            
            
            Only qualified personnel may install or repair phone equipment.
            
            
         
         
         
         Note: 
            
             ACCESSORIES AND BATTERIES
            
            
            
            Only use approved accessories and batteries. Do not connect incompatible products.
            
            
         
         
         
         Note: 
            
             CONNECTING TO OTHER DEVICES
            
            
            
            When connecting to any other device, read its user's guide for detailed safety instructions. Do not connect incompatible products.
               
            
            
            
         
         
         
         Note: 
            
             BACKUP COPIES
            
            
            
            Remember to make backup copies of all important data.
            
            
         
         
         
         Note: 
            
             WATER-RESISTANCE
            
            
            
            Your phone is not water-resistant. Keep it dry.

Call functions
      
      
      
      
         
         
         
         
         
         
      
      
      
      
         
         
            
            Making a call
               
            
            
            Answering or rejecting a call
               
            
            
         
         
         
         Related tasks
            
            
            Making a call
            
            Voice dialling
            
            Answering or rejecting a call
         
         
         
         Related information
            
            
            Speed Dialling
            
            Keys overview

Game Downloads
      
      
      
      
         The phone supports downloading new applications and games from different WAP services.
         
         
         Press Menu, and select Games and Game downloads (network service).
         
         
         The list of available WAP bookmarks is shown. Select the appropriate bookmark to connect to the desired WAP page. If the connection
            fails, you may not be able to access the WAP page from the WAP service whose connection settings are currently active.
         
         
         
         To view the size of memory available for game and application installations, press Menu, and select Games and Memory.
         
         
         For the availability of different WAP services, pricing and tariffs, contact your network operator and/or the WAP service
            provider.
            Attention: Only install software from sources that offer adequate protection against viruses and other harmful software.
            
            
         
         
         
      
      
      
      
      
         
         
            
            Parent topic: Games

Listening to music
      
      
      
         
         
         
            
               Press the Music key and select Music Player.
               
            
            
            
               The 4-way scroll key enables you to use the music functions
               
               
                  
                  
                     
                     To fast forward or rewind the current track, press and hold  or , respectively.
                     
                     
                     
                     To skip to the next or previous track on the track list, quickly press  or , respectively.
                     
                     
                     
                     To stop the playback, press .
                     
                     
                     
                     To continue the playback, press .
                     
                     
                     
                  
                  
                  
               
               
            
            
            
               To turn off the Music player, press the Music key and select Switch Music Off
               
            
            
         
         
         
      
      
      
      
         
         
            
            Parent topic: Music functions

Charging the battery
      
      
      
         
         
            
               Connect the lead from the charger to the socket of your phone.
               
               
                  
                  
                  
               
               
            
            
            
               Connect the charger to an AC wall socket.
               
               The text Charging is displayed briefly if the phone is switched on. If the battery is completely flat, it may take a few minutes
                  before the charging indicator appears on the display or any calls can be made.
               
               
            
            
         
         
         
         
            
            You can use the phone while the charger is connected.
            
            
         
         
         
      
      
      
      
         
         
            
            Parent topic: Getting started
            
         
         
         
         Related concepts
            
            
            Standby mode

         Related information
            
            
            Connectors overview
            
            Essential indicators in standby mode

Editing a contact
      
      
      
         
         
            
               Search for the contact you want to edit and press Detail. 
               
            
            
            
               Scroll to the name, number or text item you want to edit, and press Options. 
               
            
            
            
               Select Edit Name, Edit Number, or Edit Detail, and edit the name, number, or text and press OK.
               
            
            
         
         
         
      
      
      
      
         
         
            
            Parent topic: Phone book

Saving names and numbers
      
      
      
      
         
         
         
         
            
               Press Contacts (or press Go to and select Contacts) and select Add contact.
               
            
            
            
               Key in the name and press OK.
               
            
            
            
               Key in the phone number, and press OK.
               
            
            
            
               When the name and number are saved, press Done.
               
                Quick save In standby mode, key in the phone number. Press Options, and select Save. Key in the name, press OK and Done.
               
               
            
            
         
         
         
      
      
      
      
         
         
            
            Parent topic: Phone book

Connectors overview
      
      
      
      
         
         
         
         
            
            
            
               
               Charger connector
               
               
               Connector for headsets, the connectivity cable and loopset
               
               
               Audio line-in connector for the audio cable to connect the phone to external audio equipment
               
               
            
            
            
         
         
         
         
      
      
      
      
         
         
            
            Parent topic: Your phone
